meanings.definition: The quality or state of being prompt or on time.
meanings.sent1: Her promptnesses in submitting assignments always impresses the teacher.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate your promptnesses in arriving at the meeting on time.
meanings.sent3: The promptnesses of the alarm clock saved me from being late for work.
meanings.sent4: His promptnesses in responding to emails is like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The promptnesses of the train departure made the commute smooth and efficient.

meanings.definition: The act of being prompt or punctual.
meanings.sent1: The promptnesses of the students handing in their homework was commendable.
meanings.sent2: Paying bills with promptnesses avoids late fees.
meanings.sent3: The promptnesses of the cat waiting by the door for breakfast was amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her promptnesses in meeting deadlines is a shining example for the team.
meanings.sent5: The promptnesses of the sunrise brought a sense of freshness to the morning.
